title: I'm indiscriminately reporting Ryze players for cheating until he gets a a full rework.
body: He's way too easy to Macro or Script with. If I see a Ryze, they're copping a Report with an Essay attached.

replies.body:
"Every bad ryze is scripting because ryze is easy to script with"

He does need a rework though, i will agree with that.

Especially after the RoA buffs.

Honestly, as petty as it is, most of the Ryze's I've encountered have reported probably actually been scripting.
theres nothing hard about pressing q w e r q w e q w e q w e r q w e q w e
hint, if you did it in that order you just failed at ryze, the actual combo is Q>W>Q>E>Q>W>Q>E.
